verbose_text: Although both EGF and TGFalpha activate the EGF receptor and induce receptor endocytosis, EGF preferentially targets the receptor to multi-vesicular bodies and lysosomal degradation, while TGFalpha enhances receptor recycling and surface availability [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: EGF and TGFalpha activate the EGF receptor and induce receptor endocytosis
